comment: she can be rude to students. she locks the doors the moment class starts and scolds you if you're late, even a minute late. her exams/quizzes are all essays and she grades them harshly. she's a great lecturer and i liked how she presented the topic, if u can handle a rude professor for the sake of interesting classes, id say go for it
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Tough grader

comment: hard exterior. tests are essays. tough grader. calls you out if youre late. assigns a lot to read. pop quizzes. little to no group work. do not skip class!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Test heavy--Tough grader

comment: Professor Mims is awesome. Her class is very interesting and she gives very engaging lectures. I had read some conflicting reviews but I throughly enjoyed her class. I had to make up a test because I was going out of town and she allowed me to make it up no problem. I would definitely recommend her class. I am taking her again this fall!
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Get ready to read--Amazing lectures

comment: Class was an absolute nightmare!She is the hardest grader ever and all of the tests are 4-5 essay questions with 250 word minimum. The reading is multiple chapters 25 pages long a week and not to mention all of the extra work assignments graded like Simon Cowell. Never had a harder teacher at KSU. She makes you work for bad grades. Do not take her!
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--So many papers

comment: This was my first semester at KSU and hands down she was one of my best teachers. You might be intimidated at first but shes really nice. The class wasnt like a normal boring history class. She discussed societal and important issues everyone should know about. I recommend everyone to take this class with her you wont regret it.

Yes she is strict about being on time and runs class the whole but she has very engaging discussions. I am never bored in her class. She will also work with you outside of class to help you with exams. She has a funny personality and actually brought candy for us one day. HOWEVER, the exams are all essays and she has very high expectations for them
rating_tags: Beware of pop quizzes--Amazing lectures--Tough grader

comment: she's passionate about what she teaches and tries to make history interesting! the class is taught through a minority lens- we spend most of it talking about oppressed groups, but if you'd prefer a more general rather than social look on history pick someone else. she's a tough grader and seems mean at first but she cares about her students!
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: She was intimidating at first but she became less intimidating as we got to know her, she's pretty funny and nice if you give her a chance! She only has a few sporadic quizzes and 3 major tests, so there's little to no GPA fluff if you bomb them. and PLEASE, FOR THE LOVE OF GOD, READ THE TEXTBOOK!! she made history enjoyable---would take again!!!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Graded by few things--So many papers

comment: I took her hybrid class and you have either a discussion post or a quiz due every Monday at noon. You MUST read the text book and take good notes or you wont pass. This class is more of a history class than anything else. Dr. Mims is great and she really does care about her students but she has high expectations in regards to grading.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Accessible outside class--Get ready to read

comment: I would not take her for a gen-ed class. She makes it super hard and no one i've talked to in that class is making an A. She's also kind of rude.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--So many papers

comment: Withdraw as quickly as possible. Definitely way too hard for a gen-ed course. Save yourself some time and take someone else
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: She's super nice, but crazy about attendance and showing up on time. I'm an A student on my papers, and I got C's most of the time. Wayyyyy too hard for a gened class- go find an easier teacher. She does make it interesting though if this is for your major.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Tough grader
Tough Grader--Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: She's the worst. Do not take her.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--SO MANY PAPERS
